name: npmplus
tagline: An enhanced reverse proxy manager with extended features
description: NPMplus is an enhanced fork of Nginx Proxy Manager offering additional plugins, UI improvements, and community integrations for easier reverse proxy and SSL management in self-hosted setups.

features.title: Enhanced Proxy Manager
features.description: Fork of Nginx Proxy Manager with additional features and improvements

features.title: Ssl Management
features.description: Automatic certificate generation and renewal with Let's Encrypt and custom CAs

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with community plugins and integrations

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Protect services with IP whitelisting, basic auth, or custom authentication

features.title: Custom Nginx Configs
features.description: Add advanced directives and configurations for specialized needs
